text: (nayavañcakarkaḷē! Uṅkaḷ nilaimai) uṅkaḷukku muṉṉiruntavarkaḷiṉ nilaimaiyai ottirukkiṟatu. Avarkaḷ uṅkaḷaiviṭa palacālikaḷākavum, (uṅkaḷai viṭa) atika poruḷuṭaiyavarkaḷākavum, atika cantatiyuṭaiyavarkaḷākavum iruntu (ivvulakil) taṅkaḷukkuk kiṭaitta ippākkiyaṅkaḷaik koṇṭu cukamaṭaintārkaḷ. Uṅkaḷukku muṉṉirunta ivarkaḷ taṅkaḷukkuk kiṭaitta pākkiyaṅkaḷaikkoṇṭu (ivvulakil) cukamaṭaintavāṟē, nīṅkaḷum uṅkaḷukkuk kiṭaitta pākkiyaṅkaḷaik koṇṭu cukamaṭaintu viṭṭīrkaḷ. Avarkaḷ (vīṇ vivātaṅkaḷil) mūḻkik kiṭantavāṟē nīṅkaḷum mūḻkiviṭṭīrkaḷ. Im'maiyilum maṟumaiyilum avarkaḷuṭaiya (naṟ)ceyalkaḷ aṉaittum aḻintuviṭṭaṉa. (Ataṉāl) avarkaḷ perum naṣṭamaṭaintu viṭṭārkaḷ. (Avvāṟē nīṅkaḷum naṣṭamaṭaivīrkaḷ)
